item.title: Ramblings on style and pythonisms
item.description: Motivation If you get yourself into PEP8ing mode, what do you tend to see? You tend to see the PEP8 stuff and not what really matters. – Raymond Hettinger, 2015 Firstly, I am by no means a python expert, but I have been using python since September 2015 (almost 4 years at the time of writing). In that time I’ve seen numerous codebases written by people of varying ability and experience.
